data.actual_result: It opens and shows a weird transparent window which is intractable and will insert the GIF in a message draft.
data.expected_result: The GIF picker does not open as you don't have permission to send messages.
data.short_description: Ctrl + G in a channel which you don't have permission to send messages in still opens the GIF Picker
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel which you don't have permissions to send messages in - Hit Ctrl + G
